alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Washington (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 2:10PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Washington and southeastern Dodge Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 209 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm south of Hartford, moving north northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. Accumulating small hail is possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hartford, Ashippun, Rubicon, Neosho, and Monches. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
